item.title: Go语言 Defer Return 执行顺序探究
item.description: defer之间的执行顺序 go 的 defer 语句是用来延迟执行函数的关键字 package main import "fmt" func defers(a int) int { defer func() { fmt.Println("Defer 1...") }() defer func() { fmt.Println("Defer 2...") }() fmt.Println("Run defers ...") return a } func main() { res:= defers(1) fmt.Printf("get result: %d\n",res) } //运行
